scripts.save-test-output: docker compose up -d && prisma migrate dev --name init --schema ../main/prisma/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema ../main/prisma/schema.prisma && vitest --config ./vitest.config.integration.ts --no-color --reporter verbose --run --silent > test-output.txt && docker stop tests-db-1
scripts.test: docker compose up -d && prisma migrate dev --name init --schema ../main/prisma/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema ../main/prisma/schema.prisma && vitest --config ./vitest.config.integration.ts && docker stop tests-db-1
scripts.test-once-on-ci: prisma migrate dev --name init --schema ../main/prisma/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema ../main/prisma/schema.prisma && vitest --config ./vitest.config.integration.ts
